Mod.name: Anvil of Destiny
Mod.description:
Adds a semi-rare room with an anvil to most biomes, where you can improve your wands!
 Just open your inventory and drag your wands out to throw them onto the anvil.
 Wand + Wand = New better wand based on the stats of the input wands and spells Tablet + Wand + Wand = Same as above but with 1 additional random always cast spell
 Tablet + Tablet + Wand = Get back same wand with improved stats!
 The order in which you sacrifice items doesn't matter. Have fun!
